reviews.review:

Das Spiel ist ganz witzig und man muss sich erst einmal eindenken. Wenn man aber dann drin ist, finde ich das Spiel zu einfach. Mit sechs Stunden für den Single Player finde ich es auch deutlich zu kurz.
Great game to play with friends
It's Portal 2 what do you expect it's good.
合作友尽系列哈哈哈哈哈 智商检测机

Jogo fantástico. Gráficos ótimos (já faz 8 anos e ele ainda é beeem bonito de se olhar), gameplay absurdamente perfeita, uma história que eu considero uma das melhores já feitas e um humor que fecha tudo com chave de ouro!
i think this game was absolutley amazing

WOW. I'm not usually one to write bad reviews, but I just *HAD TO* type this out and get it out of my system especially considering the "overwhelmingly positive" reviews here, and the fact that the quality of this game is never questioned by, like, anybody. I bought both Portal and Portal 2 when they were on sale a while ago, and I immensely enjoyed playing the first game (which I still consider to be a masterclass in world building, storytelling, and game design). I was so excited to dive into Portal 2 and perhaps my expectations were a bit too high. Well, not only were my expectations crushed, but the game left a bitter taste in my mouth long after I (FINALLY!) finished it. I subsequently immediately uninstalled this mess and I'll happily go on pretending no sequel exists. 

First of all, this alleged "sequel" feels less like a legit Valve game and more like it was commissioned by Valve with Disney Studios / Pixar handling the story + characters and some other game developer handling the rest. Whereas the first game felt like an impeccable science fiction piece with its minimalistic visuals, isolating atmosphere, and a surprising layer of depth - Portal 2 proceeds to drag the series down to the same level as such children classics as WALL-E or Monsters, Inc. - as the player is constantly bombarded by some of the worst dialogue I've ever heard in a video game and one of the most unlikeable characters EVER - Wheatley. The unnecessary addition of this abomination single handedly ruined the entire single player experience for me, especially near the second half of the game when, due to a completely predictable plot twist, his presence and kindergarten humor becomes essentially omnipresent. Also, GLaDOS - one of the most complex and intriguing villains I've ever had the pleasure to witness in a video game also receives the Disney/Pixar treatment and is reduced to a talking potato. No, I'm not kidding. A POTATO. The story in this game is equal to a turd resulting from bad constipation. 

As for the gameplay, it is mostly the same as the first game although the introduction of "gels" = different colored goo with unique properties results in some new fun and creative puzzles. However, even that can't save this game from being VERY repetitive and somewhat boring. I feel like the game should've been shorter - by the time I finally reached the end it has long overstayed its welcome.

Portal 2 - лучшая игра от вентиля для меня. Первая часть была скорее технодемкой, а не полноценной игрой. Вторая часть продолжила идеи заложенной первой частью и развивала их. Головоломки стали интересней. Интересней стало и следить за развитием сюжета. В игре смешной юмор. Фразы выдаваемые Гладос и Уитли можно расхватывать на цитаты. Озвучка Уитли кстати получилась просто отличной. Голос актера идеально подошел персонажу. Также приятным дополнением является ничем не уступающий основному сюжету ко-оп. Юмор остался на таком же уровне, а проходить уровни с другом одно удовольствие. Надеюсь когда нибуть валв осмелятся выпустить третью часть которая превзойдет вторую.
The storyline, the levels and the gameplay was soo good. I enjoyed the whole game.
Very Challenging but Fun at the same time 10/10
Лучшая головоломка, в которую я когда-ли играл. Рекомендую всем.
Bien plus abouti que le premier, la mise en scène est impeccable !

very epic, i love when my friends play it with me... but its very rare to play co-op now. I only have friends by playing portal 2 or just have discord in my side and then add them. my 3 pals have portal 2!!!! i think one of them deleted it... But i love  Playing with my friends with the game. I literally get it 10/10!!
гра топ но для етого нужно пройти 1-ую часть портал в общем збс
очень интересная игра для людей у которых IQ>0
Если первая Portal - шедевр, раскрывающая множество игровых механик, то вторая... Рекомендую!11!1!!

응 하프라이트 어꺠동무하고있는 갓겜 
게이머라면 한번 클리어 해봐야하는게임중 하나

Hilarious puzzle game.  Had lots of fun being insulted by the A.I. while trying to solve these puzzles.  One of the best puzzle games I have ever played.
It has a great story, lots of plot twists and a nice theme

especially great if you have played the original portal too, if you are interested in a storyline as well. great 'puzzles', some are very hard, but they are always simple when you find out :). the right difficulty level and interaction keeps you playing for a solid hour each time you start

This is my all-time favorite game, it just delivers on SO many aspects. Portal 2 takes what the first game did and makes it 10 times better somehow. The funny writing, the challenging and brain-twisting puzzles, the way that you just begin to understand exactly how portals work and it becomes second nature, the amazing CO-OP, and all of the community test chambers make this an amazing game to just keep coming back to over and over again. If you enjoy puzzles and being challenged to come up with creative solutions, if you love sarcastic and (at times) slightly dark humor from a sadistic yet lovable robot lady who dangles from the ceiling and is out for revenge, then you will love Portal 2.
Uma das melhores utilizações de uma das mais clássicas engines de fps. Ótimo enredo e maravilhosa jogabilidade, para quem gosta de ficção cientifica então... Obrigatório.
Csak vedd meg és játssz! Nem fogsz csalódni! :D

Отличная головоломка с хорошим сюжетом и оптимизацией + есть кооператив
10 картошек Гладос/ 10
рекомендую всем, без исключения. Интересная история, головоломки и прекраснейшая русская локализация покорили моё сердечко навсегда.

Arkadaşlarınızla oynarsanız gülme krizine girersiniz güzel bi oyun :)
once again BEAUTIFUL game love everything about it and how it takes you back to the first portal LOVE IT MAKE PORTAL 3
i love this game. i hit my dad to sleep :C

[h1]FPS와 퍼즐의 융합[/h1]

1편에 비해 그래픽과 실제 분위기가 더 현실적이고, 찝찝하게 바뀌었음. 벽에 포탈 두 개만 쏴보면 바로 이해할 수 있을 정도의 간단한 게임 시스템. 물리법칙에 관심이 있다면 더 재밌게 즐길 수 있음. 코옵은 더 꿀잼이니 꼭 해야함.

아틀라스 존나 귀여움.
Desde que lo jugué me gustó, después de un tiempo ya me sabía todo el lore y teorías raras. Es mi juego favorito junto con AC IV: Black Flag y lo recomendaré siempre.
